subject: Mathematics
question_en: What is the value of sin 30°?
explanation_en: sin 30° is a standard trigonometric value equal to 1/2.
explanation_hi: sin 30° एक मानक त्रिकोणमितीय मान है जो 1/2 के बराबर होता है।

subject: Mathematics
question_en: If the sum of two consecutive odd numbers is 52, what is the smaller number?
question_hi: यदि दो क्रमागत विषम संख्याओं का योग 52 है, तो छोटी संख्या क्या है?
explanation_en: Let the numbers be x and x+2. Then x + x+2 = 52 ⇒ x = 25.
explanation_hi: मान लीजिए संख्याएँ x और x+2 हैं। तब x + x+2 = 52 ⇒ x = 25।

subject: Mathematics
question_en: What is the HCF of 36 and 84?
explanation_en: Prime factors of 36 = 2²×3², 84 = 2²×3×7. Common factors give HCF = 12.

subject: Mathematics
question_en: If log₂x = 5, what is the value of x?
question_hi: यदि log₂x = 5, तो x का मान क्या है?

subject: Mathematics
question_en: What is the area of an equilateral triangle with side 4 cm?
question_hi: 4 सेमी भुजा वाले समबाहु त्रिभुज का क्षेत्रफल क्या है?

subject: Mathematics
question_en: If a² + b² = 29 and ab = 10, what is a + b?
question_hi: यदि a² + b² = 29 और ab = 10, तो a + b क्या है?

subject: Mathematics
question_en: What is the compound interest on ₹2000 for 2 years at 10% per annum?
question_hi: ₹2000 पर 2 वर्ष के लिए 10% वार्षिक दर से चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज क्या है?

subject: Mathematics
question_en: What is the slope of the line 3x – 4y + 7 = 0?

subject: Mathematics
question_en: If the mean of 5, 7, 9, x, 15 is 10, what is x?
